reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel the year before and despite many hotels in the area that were offering promotions I tried this hotel again due to the fact I enjoyed it so much before.
reviews.title: 2nd Visit

reviews.text: I thought this was a fairly average resort; my room was just ok, bed a bit lumpy and very little natural light from a small window high up. I had booked a 'Deluxe' room but I think they had given me a standard room (or so it seemed). Bathroom was acceptable. The staff were a bit off hand though the pool was OK and well looked after. The location is a fair way from 'walking street'. About 45 mins walk!
reviews.title: Fairly Average
